00017 #ifndef _AUDACITY_CAPTURE_EVENTS_
00018 #define _AUDACITY_CAPTURE_EVENTS_
00019 
00020 #if defined(__WXGTK__) && defined(HAVE_GTK)
00021 // As of wxGTK 2.8.9, there is a problem in the wxClipboard class that
00022 // allows recursive event processing.  This problem has been corrected
00023 // by wxWidgets 2.9+.  However, this han't made it into a release yet,
00024 // so we have to work around it.
00025 //
00026 // This is done by pulling/merging in some code from wx29 and creating
00027 // the following class to capture events while accessing the clipboard
00028 // to prevent the asynchronous clipboard access from causing recursive
00029 // event processing.
00030 
00031 #include <wx/dynarray.h>
00032 
00033 class CaptureEvents
00034 {
00035  public:
00036    CaptureEvents();
00037 
00038    virtual ~CaptureEvents();
00039 
00040  private:
00041    wxArrayPtrVoid queue;
00042 };
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 #endif
